nodes.text: The Tourist Center on Coruscant was a building located near the Senate Landing Platform where the Naboo Royal Starship arrived in 32 BBY. It was the headquarters of Coruscant City Tours and location of the Tourist Director's office. Beings could purchase tickets from a protocol droid to embark on the Tours on the tour transport.
The Tourist Center appears in 1999's Star Wars: Episode I The Phantom Menace video game.
